forecast-period.text: Partly cloudy. Slight (20%) chance of a shower in the northeast, near zero chance elsewhere. The chance of a thunderstorm. Winds northwest to northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h tending northwest to southwesterly in the late evening.

Partly cloudy. High (70%) chance of showers in the east, slight (20%) chance elsewhere. The chance of a thunderstorm. Winds northwest to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h becoming light before dawn then becoming northwest to northeasterly 15 to 20 km/h in the late afternoon. Overnight temperatures falling to the low to mid 20s with daytime temperatures reaching 33 to 39.
UV Alert from 7:50 am to 3:20 pm, UV Index predicted to reach 14 [Extreme]

Partly cloudy. Very high (90%) chance of showers in the southeast, medium (60%) chance elsewhere. The chance of a thunderstorm. Winds northwest to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h becoming light before dawn. Overnight temperatures falling to the mid to high 20s with daytime temperatures reaching 33 to 38.

Partly cloudy. Medium (50%) chance of showers and thunderstorms, most likely in the afternoon and evening. Light winds. Overnight temperatures falling to the mid to high 20s with daytime temperatures reaching the low to high 30s.

Partly cloudy. Medium (50%) chance of showers in the afternoon and evening. The chance of a thunderstorm in the afternoon and evening. Light winds. Overnight temperatures falling to the mid 20s with daytime temperatures reaching the mid to high 30s.
Clear. Winds northwest to southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h.

Mostly sunny. Slight (30%) chance of a shower in the far west, near zero chance elsewhere. The chance of a thunderstorm in the southwest in the evening. Winds northwest to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h becoming northwesterly 15 to 25 km/h in the morning then tending northwest to southwesterly in the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to the low 20s with daytime temperatures reaching 32 to 38.
UV Alert from 8:40 am to 3:50 pm, UV Index predicted to reach 13 [Extreme]

Partly cloudy. Slight (30%) chance of a shower in the far west in the morning. Near zero chance of rain elsewhere. The chance of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Overnight temperatures falling to the low to mid 20s with daytime temperatures reaching 30 to 39.

Partly cloudy. Medium (40%) chance of showers in the far east in the afternoon and early evening. The chance of a thunderstorm in the east during the afternoon and evening. Winds southeast to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h tending northeast to southeasterly during the morning then tending northwest to northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h during the day. Overnight temperatures falling to 20 to 27 with daytime temperatures reaching the mid to high 30s.

Partly cloudy. Slight (30%) chance of a shower and a thunderstorm in the afternoon and evening, mainly over inland central and eastern parts. Light winds becoming northwest to northeasterly 15 to 20 km/h during the afternoon. Overnight temperatures falling to 20 to 26 with daytime temperatures reaching the mid to high 30s.

Partly cloudy. Slight (20%) chance of a shower near the far southwest coast, near zero chance elsewhere. The chance of a thunderstorm in the southeast later this evening. Winds west to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h.

Partly cloudy. Slight (30%) chance of a shower near the far southwest coast in the morning. Near zero chance of rain elsewhere. The chance of a thunderstorm in the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to the low to mid 20s with daytime temperatures reaching 28 to 33.

Mostly sunny. Slight (20%) chance of a shower or a thunderstorm in the northeast, mainly in the afternoon and evening. Winds northeast to southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h tending northwest to southwesterly during the afternoon then tending northeast to southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h during the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to between 18 and 23 with daytime temperatures reaching 30 to 36.

Partly cloudy. Slight (20%) chance of a shower about the coast during the morning. Slight (30%) chance of showers in the east in the afternoon and evening. Partly cloudy. Slight (20%) chance of a shower. The chance of a thunderstorm, with possible heavy falls early this evening. Winds easterly 15 to 25 km/h.

Partly cloudy. High (80%) chance of showers in the east, medium (40%) chance elsewhere. The chance of a thunderstorm. Heavy falls exceeding 40 mm possible in the east. Overnight temperatures falling to between 15 and 21 with daytime temperatures reaching 24 to 31.
